Activity.title: Activity
Activity.description: An activity is something that occurs over a period of time and acts upon or with entities; it may include consuming, processing, transforming, modifying, relocating, using, or generating entities.

title.title: Title
title.description: A name given to the activity.

used_entity.title: Used entity
used_entity.description: Resource that was used in this activity

was_associated_with.title: wasAssociatedWith
was_associated_with.description: An activity association is an assignment of responsibility to an agent for an activity, indicating that the agent had a role in the activity.

variable.title: Variable
variable.description: Variable that was affected by the activity

CatalogRecord.title: Catalog Record
CatalogRecord.description: A record in a data catalog, describing a single dataset.

data_catalog.title: Research data catalog
data_catalog.description: Research Data Catalog identifier or embedded object to data_catalog property in embedded object.

date_created.title: Date Created
date_created.description: Date of creation of the resource.

date_modified.title: Date Modified
date_modified.description: Date on which the resource was changed.

research_dataset.title: Research Dataset
research_dataset.description: Dataset described by this metadata record.

contract.title: Contract
contract.description: Contract identifier or embedded contract object

preservation_state.title: Preservation state
preservation_state.description: state of dataset in PAS cycle: 0 = Not in PAS, 1 = Proposed for midtterm, 2 = Proposed for long term, 3, =in packaging service, 4 = in dissemination, 5 = in midterm preservation, 6 = in longterm preservation, 7 = Rejected long-term preservation, 8 = Rejected mid-term preservation

preservation_description.title: Preservation system description
preservation_description.description: Preservation status described for the user

preservation_reason_description.title: Preservation reason description
preservation_reason_description.description: Reason for the preservation from the user

deprecated.title: Deprecated
deprecated.description: Catalog record is deprecated because files are removed

alternate_record.title: Alternate record
alternate_record.description: Refers to alternate catalog record in different catalog. This reference is created if two datasets in different catalogs have the same preferred identifier

next.title: Next version
next.description: A link to the next version of the catalog record

editor.title: Editor
editor.description: Software or service that is used to modify the catalog record and the dataset

Concept.title: Concept
Concept.description: An idea or notion; a unit of thought.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: This is the IRI identifier for the concept

pref_label.title: Preferred label
pref_label.description:
The preferred lexical label for a resource, in a given language. A resource has no more than one value of skos:prefLabel per language tag, and no more than one value of skos:prefLabel without language tag. The range of skos:prefLabel is the class of RDF plain literals. skos:prefLabel, skos:altLabel and skos:hiddenLabel are pairwise
      disjoint properties.

definition.title: Definition
definition.description: A statement or formal explanation of the meaning of a concept.

in_scheme.title: Is in scheme
in_scheme.description: Relates a resource (for example a concept) to a concept scheme in which it is included.

ConceptScheme.title: Concept Scheme
ConceptScheme.description: A set of concepts, optionally including statements about semantic relationships between those concepts.

pref_label.title: Preferred label
pref_label.description:
The preferred lexical label for a resource, in a given language. A resource has no more than one value of skos:prefLabel per language tag, and no more than one value of skos:prefLabel without language tag. The range of skos:prefLabel is the class of RDF plain literals. skos:prefLabel, skos:altLabel and skos:hiddenLabel are pairwise
      disjoint properties.

Directory.title: Directory in IDA
Directory.description: Directory that links to its contained resources.

title.title: Title
title.description: A name given to the file.

access_url.title: Access URL
access_url.description: Could be any kind of URL that gives access to a distribution of the dataset. E.g. landing page download, feed URL, SPARQL endpoint. Use when your catalog does not have information on which it is or when it is definitely not a download.

Document.title: Documented link
Document.description: A documented link to a document in the Web.

title.title: Title
title.description: A name given to the document

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the link. For example to be used as hover text.

Editor.title: Editor
Editor.description: Software or service that is used to modify the catalog record and the dataset

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Identifier of the editor, such as Qvain or harvester.

EntityRelation.title: Entity relation
EntityRelation.description: Description of a the dataset influence upon any other kind of entity.

relation_type.title: Relation type
relation_type.description: Role of the influence. This property is considered same as rdf:isSingletonPropertyOf.

title.title: Title
title.description: A name given to the file.

access_url.title: Access URL
access_url.description: Could be any kind of URL that gives access to a distribution of the dataset. E.g. landing page download, feed URL, SPARQL endpoint. Use when your catalog does not have information on which it is or when it is definitely not a download.

LinguisticSystem.title: Linguistic System
LinguisticSystem.description:
Examples include written, spoken, sign, and computer languages.

A system of signs, symbols, sounds, gestures, or rules used in communication.

title.title: Title
title.description: A name of the Linguistic System. Name is given as localized text from IETF language codes. In case text cannot be localixed "zxx" or "und" language codes must be used.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description:
Recommended best practice is to identify the resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system. 

An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: A spatial region or named place.

geographic_name.title: Geographic name
geographic_name.description:
A geographic name is a proper noun applied to a spatial object. Taking the example used in the relevant INSPIRE data specification (page 18), the following are all valid geographic names for the Greek capital:
- Αθήνα (the Greek endonym written in the Greek script)
- Athína (the standard Romanisation of the endonym)
- Athens (the English language exonym)
For INSPIRE-conformant data, provide the metadata for the geographic name using a skos:Concept as a datatype.

alt.title: Altitude
alt.description:
The WGS84 altitude of a SpatialThing (decimal meters 
above the local reference ellipsoid).

full_address.title: Full address
full_address.description: The complete address written as a string, with or without formatting.

as_wkt.title: Geometry
as_wkt.description: Supported format for geometry is WKT string in WGS84 coordinate system.

place_uri.title: Place uri
place_uri.description: URI for the place. Use reference data from: https://metax-test.csc.fi/es/reference_data/location/_search?pretty=true

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

name.title: Name
name.description: This property contains a name of the agent. This property can be repeated for different versions of the name (e.g. the name in different languages)

is_part_of.title: Is Part Of
is_part_of.description: A related resource in which the described resource is physically or logically included.

PeriodOfTime.title: Period of Time
PeriodOfTime.description: An interval of time that is named or defined by its start and end dates.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

name.title: Name
name.description: This property contains a name of the agent. This property can be repeated for different versions of the name (e.g. the name in different languages)

member_of.title: Member of
member_of.description: Indicates that a person is a member of the Organization with no indication of the nature of that membership or the role played.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: A project (a collective endeavour of some kind).

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Recommended best practice is to identify the resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.  An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

has_funder_identifier.title: Project funding identifier
has_funder_identifier.description: Unique identifier for the project that is being used by the project funder

funder_type.title: Funder type
funder_type.description: Project funder type from reference data

source_organization.title: Organization
source_organization.description: The Organization(s) who is/are participating to the project

title.title: Title
title.description: A name given to the resource.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Recommended best practice is to identify the resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.  An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of the entity, for example: API, Application, News article, paper, post or visualization.

ResearchAgent.title: Agent
ResearchAgent.description: An agent (eg. person, group, software or physical artifact).

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

name.title: Name
name.description: This property contains a name of the agent. This property can be repeated for different versions of the name (e.g. the name in different languages)

ResearchDataLicenseDocument.title: License Document
ResearchDataLicenseDocument.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with a Resource.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: License identifier from the reference data.

title.title: Title
title.description: A name given to the resource.

description.title: Description
description.description: Description may include but is not limited to: an abstract, a table of contents, a graphical representation, or a free-text account of the resource. An account of the resource.

license.title: Licence URL
license.description: A referenced license document that applies to this content

ResearchDataset.title: Research Dataset
ResearchDataset.description: A collection of data, published or curated by a single source, and available for access or download in one or more formats

metadata_version_identifier.title: Metadata version identifier
metadata_version_identifier.description: Dataset metadata version identifier in form of http://urn.fi{URN}:version:{number}

preferred_identifier.title: Preferred identifier
preferred_identifier.description: Unique identifier for the dataset. URN or URI.

modified.title: Dataset modification date
modified.description: Last known time when a research dataset or metadata about the research dataset has been significantly modified. This field is usually modified by the user or harvested from other source.

version_info.title: Version
version_info.description: This property contains a version number or other version designation of the Dataset.

version_notes.title: Version notes
version_notes.description: This property contains a description of the differences between this version and a previous version of the Dataset. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the version notes.

issued.title: Release date
issued.description: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the resource.

title.title: Title
title.description: Textual label which concisely describes the content of the dataset. Based on the title of the dataset, a human should have a general understanding of the topic of the dataset. The title should be unique enough that it is unlikely to be used for another dataset.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: A keyword or tag describing the dataset. It is recommended to use a controlled vocabulary, ontology or classification when choosing keywords.

description.title: Description
example: Tämä aineisto on osaa FMI ClimGrid aineistoa, joka on päivittäinen ilmastohila-aineisto Suomelle ...

bibliographic_citation.title: Preferred Bibliographic Citation
bibliographic_citation.description: Preferred bibliographic reference for the resource.

publisher.title: Distributor
publisher.description: An agent who has permission to distribute the dataset or who has made the dataset available.

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: A person or organisation who originally produced the dataset, the original rights holder

contributor.title: Contributor
contributor.description: A person or organisation that has contributed significantly in the creation of the dataset

is_output_of.title: Producer project
is_output_of.description: A project that has caused the dataset to be created

rights_holder.title: Dataset owner
rights_holder.description: A person or organisation who holds the copyright of the dataset at the current moment, usually the organization of the author – this does not mean the owner of the storage media (such as a memory stick) but the rights holder

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: The main category of the dataset. A dataset can have multiple themes. Themes are concepts which relate to the content of the dataset, describe the dataset or express its topic or meaning.

language.title: Language
language.description: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as RFC 4646 [RFC4646]. A language of the resource.

relation.title: Relation
relation.description: A related dataset or other entity

field_of_science.title: Field of science
field_of_science.description: Scientific discipline whose data collection has produced the dataset

provenance.title: Provenance
provenance.description: A statement of any changes in ownership and custody of the resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.

value.title: Metadata quality value
value.description: Metadata quality value calculated in some manner.

files.title: List of files
files.description: Connects a dataset to one or more of files in IDA

directories.title: List of directories
directories.description: Connects a dataset to one of its available distributions.

infrastructure.title: Used infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Service or tools that is used to produce the dataset

total_ida_byte_size.title: Total ida byte size
total_ida_byte_size.description: Sum of all Ida distribution byte size. Read only field.

RightsStatement.title: Rights Statement
RightsStatement.description: A statement about the intellectual property rights (IPR) held in or over a Resource, a legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource, or a statement about access rights.

available.title: Date Available
available.description: Date (often a range) that the resource became or will become available.

access_type.title: Access type
access_type.description: The nature or genre of the resource.

restriction_grounds.title: Restriction grounds
restriction_grounds.description: Classified reason of allocated access type.

license.title: License
license.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.

local_identifier_type.title: Local identifier type
local_identifier_type.description: Local identifier type defines use of the identifier in given context.

concept.title: Concept
concept.description: Describes the concept of the variable

universe.title: Universe
universe.description: Indicates the Universe(s) of represented variable

representation.title: Representation
representation.description: Defines the possible values of a variable
